content: this is a pdf to create this shawl and is not a finished product to be bought for this project you will need hook 4 mm hook or size g hook for the us yarn i used a 1000 meter yarn cake from yarnart s flower collection #265 content 55% organic cotton 45% anti pilling acrylic ball weight 250 g 8 8 oz yarn weight 1 fingering yarn length 1000 m 1093 yd gauge and sizing gauge is 2 sts per cm or 5 sts per inch my shawl measures wide - 49 inches or 124 cms tall - 23 inches or 59 cms abbreviations click on link to find tutorials chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch skip = skip space = space double_crochet = double_crochet beg = beginning *= repeat what s in between * for rest of round you can find the video tutorials on my youtube page @ meladora1
